body.para: Thomas - is it due rendering engine of IE 8 versus that of FF or Chrome - which shows such difference in terms of response time ?
On Jun 2, 6:04Â am, Thomas Broyer <t.bro...@gmail.com> wrote:

quote.quotepara: With such numbers ("1 list box has 4000 elements and one suggestion box has 7000 elements"), the culprit is undoubtedly IE, and you can't do anything about it.
